alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 7:55PM EDT until April 06 at 3:17AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Mill Creek at Evendale. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mill Creek at Evendale. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Canal Road near UPS floods with high water along Kemper and Mosteller Roads near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
